contents: On Friday at 10:00 a.m., there will be a departmental meeting with Marc DeMille, Juan, and the customer service representatives. (3) <u>He will introduce himself</u> to all customer service employees, answer questions, and provide an overview of his plans. (4) <u>All the managers, including Juan, wants</u> to hear your ideas. Please feel free to bring up any thoughts or concerns during this meeting. Beginning on Monday, Juan will have individual meetings with each employee to discuss specific issues in depth. Our company (5) <u>values</u> your (5) <u>advise</u> and (5) <u>expertise</u> about the department’s needs.
